name: M01 - Markrún Pillow
description:
Taking inspiration from Herðubreið the iconic mountain which stands alone in a lava desert, Leopold Kristjansson and Steinunn Arnardottir have created a theme of products that showcase this legend.

The Icelandic duo’s pillows are the showpiece of their collection. The simple clean shape was inspired by native art and modernistic design.

Fabrics are sourced all around the world with each pillow handmade by Leopold and Steinunn.

All pillows have a concealed zipper underneath and an inner pillow. The cover is double layered, giving the pillow a firmer feel and shape. Covers as well as filling are washable. 

Small - W: 33cm (12") x H: 24cm (9,5")
Medium - W: 45cm (18") x H: 33cm (12")
Large - W: 65cm (25,5") x H: 45cm (18")

name: Wonderland Polaroid Print
description:
Dan Isaac Wallin’s work explores the lost art of Polaroid and analog photography and fuses it with alternative production methods such as cyanotype and salt print. This painstakingly long discipline creates a signature ‘other world’ style.

Taking inspiration from the Swedish countryside, his first set of prints portray the vibrancy of changing seasons and extremities of Sweden’s landscape whilst capture significant milestones in his own personal journey.

A resident of Gothenburg, Wallin has been a photographer for almost 15 years. Graduating from prestigious art school Biskops-Arnö, Dan’s work has been showcased in exhibitions across Europe.

Size: 50 x 70cm
Printed on 200g paper
Postage and packaging included

name: Not Rudolf
description:
Tired of the standard coat stands? Looking for a unique solution to hanging up everyday items?

Award winning designer Ingibjörg Hanna has crafted Not Rudolf, a beautiful crafted hanger which is perfect for storing coats, handbags and hats. When free of everyday apparel, the Not Rudolf shines as a simple wall feature.

Item come in two parts. 
Each horn is 50cm v 10 cm v 20cm.
Weight is 350g each.

name: Boot Master
description:
Faer Id a collaborative design house of Nordic designers with a goal to make beautiful storage accessories introduce The Boot Master.

The Boot Master is a stylish and chic way of storing and protecting your favourite winter boots.  A must have for anyone who owns a number of pairs of designer boots that need protecting.

Boot Master works on all designer boots and wellingtons.

name: Snail Hook
description:
The Snail Hook is the perfect wall hanger. A unique and artistic solution to storing family coats, placing jewellery for your night out next to a mirror ready for the night out or storing aprons in a kitchen. The stone sculpture Snail Hook is a beautiful hanger that will be envied by friends whilst being a practical solution without ruining the aesthetics of a room.

Designed by award winning designer Ingibjörg Hanna, this is a great opportunity to purchase one of her original designs.

name: Turks Head Knot Cushion
description:
Inspired by nautical knots, Ragnheiður has lovingly created the NotKnot cushions. A masterpiece in design, the NotKnot cushions are the perfect finishing touch to any room.

By tightly woving the knot, NotKnot cushions become soft and cozy whilst providing warmth throughout the winter months.

Each NotKnot is handmade by Ragnheiður.

description:

name: Willow Hanger
description:
A hanger with several branches, the Willow Hanger is an artistic solution to grouping several items together without them all getting tied up. The Willow Hanger is a perfect solution if you want to bundle a number of accessories together or have limited storage space.

Passionately created by Faerid a trio of designers from Iceland and Sweden, the Willow Hanger is a perfect example of an artistically designed storage accessory. This product provides the finishing touches to any wardrobe whilst displaying a level of practicality that makes any modern hectic life feel less cluttered.
